header.title: Frontend
header.subtitle: Developer
header.text: Who turns ideas into seamless digital experiences

contentBlock.title: About me
contentBlock.text: Hey, I'm Frank Struik, a frontend developer focused on building modern, fast, and scalable websites. I've worked on e-commerce platforms, storytelling websites, and everything in between. What matters to me: clean code, solid performance, and making sure clients get exactly what they need.

items.title: Discovery & planning
items.text: I begin by reviewing the designs, clarifying requirements, and deciding on the best tools to bring the project to life.

items.title: Development
items.text: Then I build dynamic, responsive, and pixel-perfect pages — always keeping performance and security in mind.

items.title: Delivery & Support
items.text: Finally, I deliver clean, well-documented code and remain available for ongoing support and improvements.

items.title: How do we start a project?
items.text: We begin with an introduction where I discuss your needs and goals. After that, you'll receive a plan with timeline and quote. Once you approve, I get to work.

items.title: How do you keep me updated during the project?
items.text: You'll receive regular updates with progress and a link to the development environment. Communication is via email or a channel of your choice. At each milestone, I'll provide a time estimate for the next phase.

items.title: How long does a project typically take?
items.text: A landing page is usually done within 1-2 weeks. A complete website with CMS takes 3-6 weeks, depending on complexity. You'll always get a realistic timeline upfront.

items.title: What does a website cost?
items.text: That depends on the scope. A simple website starts around €1500, a webshop or custom project higher. After our first conversation, you'll receive a no-obligation quote.

items.title: Do you also deliver the design, or just the build?
items.text: I focus on development. Already have a design? I'll build it pixel-perfect. No design yet? I can collaborate with a designer I usually work with or help you find a suitable solution.

items.title: What happens after delivery?
items.text: You'll get a brief walkthrough of the CMS so you can manage content yourself. For maintenance, updates, or extensions, you can always reach out.
For my travelblog I was looking for a developer who had experience with the latest SEO techniques. Frank did a great job building my idea, my site has good performance and scores very well.
items.author: Gianluca B

items.text: Based on a friend's recommendation and Frank's expertise in searchable websites, we ultimately chose Frank. We explained our requirements, and he translated them into a beautiful, super-fast website that perfectly met our needs.
items.author: Patricia L
